phrs.translation: 珊文·古立斯·铃木, 珊文·铃木

sentences.sentence: When she was very young, Severn Cullis-Suzuki learned that the United Nations Assembly was going to meet in Brazil, Severn decided that she wanted not only to go there but also to say something.
sentences.translation: 在珊文·卡立斯-铃木很小的时候，她得知联合国大会将在巴西召开，珊文当时就决定她不仅要去那里，而且要说些什么。

sentences.sentence: Severn Cullis-SuzukiWhen you are little, it's not hard to believe you can change the world.
sentences.translation: 小时候，相信自己能够改变世界并不难。

sentences.sentence: Accessories are round horn ridge tiles, ridge tiles, fang ridge tiles, cullis boards, mountain tiles and flashing sheets, eaves board, etc.
sentences.translation: 配件有圆脊瓦、角脊瓦、方脊瓦、天沟板、山墙板、泛水板、檐板等。
